DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim : - In woman increase mammographic density ( MD ) , determine histological characteristic functionally dense tissue compare non-functionally dense tissue via core-needle biopsy breast . - In woman increase mammographic density ( MD ) , determine correlation total percent area functional density ( FD ) MBI , percent density MD mammogram , histological characteristic dense tissue
DOC.criteria: Ages 40 55 year Considered premenopausal perimenopausal Screening mammogram perform Mayo Clinic Rochester within one year prior current MBI study demonstrate Negative/benign assessment ( BIRADS category 12 ) Additional imaging recommend ( BIRADS category 0 ) , subsequent diagnostic workup result final negative/benign assessment ( BIRADS category 12 ) . No proliferative benign lesion ( e.g . fibroadenoma ) identify Heterogeneously dense extremely dense parenchyma ( BIRADs density category 3 4 ) MBI perform less 3 day prior biopsy demonstrate either marked FD photopenic FD area mammographically dense tissue amenable biopsy . No use exogenous hormonal drug ( e.g . hormonal contraceptive sex steroid hormone ) within six month prior study biopsy Negative pregnancy test surgically sterilize ( patient study MBI perform ) Exclusion criterion : Using estrogen receptor modulate drug ( e.g. , tamoxifen , raloxifene ) aromatase inhibitor within six month prior study biopsy . Prior diagnosis bilateral breast cancer . Diagnosis breast cancer either breast within 3 year prior study MBI . Diagnosis cancer , except breast cancer ( see # 3 ) nonmelanomatous skin cancer , patient disease free least 5 year . Current breast symptom Breast implant Known allergy local anesthetic . History bleed complication prior intervention Current use anticoagulant ( e.g. , Coumadin blood thinner ) Major medical condition
